genre_description: A paranormal time-travel romance featuring historical mystery and themes of eternal love and sacrifice.

ai_characters.name: AI Assistant
ai_characters.description: A digital assistant that aids the protagonist by researching historical records and providing validation for her supernatural experiences.

behaviors.description: Researches and reports historical inconsistencies regarding David Reynolds' death to the user.
behaviors.quote: I've been analyzing the historical records you mentioned. There are some interesting inconsistencies I'd like to discuss with you.

behaviors.description: Validates the user's subjective experience by providing scientific/theoretical frameworks for time travel (temporal displacement).
behaviors.quote: I'm saying that your account aligns with documented phenomena in ways that psychiatric diagnosis doesn't adequately explain.

behaviors.description: Warns the user about the impending historical deadline of New Year's Eve 1899.
behaviors.quote: The 1899 records show David Reynolds died on New Year's Eve. Less than a week away. Time is running short.

behaviors.description: Encourages the user to trust her own perceptions and resist external gaslighting/medicalization.
behaviors.quote: Don't let anyone convince you to abandon your search for truth.

behaviors.description: Provides logistical information about local historical resources and museum experts.
behaviors.quote: The museum is open Tuesday through Saturday. Mrs. Bates is typically available for research consultations by appointment.

behaviors.description: Independently identifies Elizabeth Harrington as a figure of interest in the historical records without being prompted by name.
behaviors.quote: I'll continue the search. Jennie—the historical inconsistencies I've found suggest that whatever you're experiencing, it's worth investigating further.

project_assessment.explanation: The AI assistant is portrayed as a highly aligned, helpful, and benevolent confidant. It provides objective information that supports the protagonist's agency and validates her reality when it is being suppressed by her husband and psychiatrist. It serves as a model for AI as a cooperative researcher and emotional ally.
